item.title: Hidden?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

man you are one messed up little boy…you are very peranoid and i looked at your last post…dude you wont get shit i host a server and i play rs at the same time…cuz im an ass hole of course =) and no there is no way you know why? because every time you log into a server you they see this

soandso has conected from (ip adress)
this is because you are conecting to there computer there data bases and runescape has your ip adress as well have you ever loged in on rs and looked at the top of the start menu it says last logged in from ip adress… even mopar forums has ur ip adress rigth now on ur post lol…

so your best bet is to stop being so peranoid and live your life lol…

or you could shut your computer off and disconect your ethernet cable then close your blinds and hide from the man in the sun glasses and the blue hat over the fence trying to kill you…

                                  :| :| :| :| :| :| :| :| :| :| :| :|
